note: Carvana uses interactive UI filters selected via checkbox/button. The site loads filters dynamically. Filters are NOT URL-based - the scraper must click on visible UI elements.

filter_ui_structure.description: Carvana uses a hierarchical interactive filter system. Users click buttons to open filter panels, then click checkboxes with visible text labels.
filter_ui_structure.selection_method: All filters use checkboxes with visible text labels. The scraper must find the label text and click the associated checkbox.

models.label: Sierra 3500
models.note: Model checkbox shows 'Sierra 3500' with SPACE not hyphen. NO 'HD' suffix in the filter!

gmc_models.trim_note: Trims are dynamically loaded after model selection. They combine the trim name with bed length (e.g., 'Denali 6 1/2 ft'). The scraper uses fuzzy matching to find trims.

scraper_input_format.description: The scraper expects a simple dict with make, model, and optional trims array.

format.make: String - Exact make label from UI (e.g., 'GMC')
format.model: String - Exact model label from UI with SPACES (e.g., 'Sierra 3500', NOT 'Sierra-3500' or 'Sierra 3500HD')
format.trims: Array of strings - Trim labels to select (e.g., ['Denali']) - scraper will fuzzy match
format.year: Integer - Single year (Carvana uses single year, not ranges)
format.features: Array of strings - Optional: Feature names to select

critical_notes: Model names use SPACES not hyphens - 'Sierra 3500' NOT 'sierra-3500'
NO 'series' parameter exists - the number (1500/2500/3500) is part of the model name
The 'HD' suffix appears in vehicle titles but is NOT part of the filter structure
Trims are optional - if not specified, the scraper skips trim filtering
Trims are loaded dynamically and combined with bed length - use fuzzy matching
All filter values must match the visible checkbox labels exactly (or use fuzzy matching)

sierra_3500_denali.explanation: User says 'Sierra 3500HD' but filter uses 'Sierra 3500'. 'Denali Ultimate' fuzzy-matches to 'Denali 6 1/2 ft' or 'Denali 8 ft'.

sierra_3500_pro.explanation: Trim 'Pro' fuzzy-matches to 'Pro 6 1/2 ft' or 'Pro 8 ft'.

notes.url_structure: Carvana URLs are for navigation only, not filter parameters. Actual filtering happens via interactive UI clicks.
notes.model_format: CRITICAL: Model names use SPACES not hyphens (e.g., 'Sierra 3500' NOT 'sierra-3500')
notes.no_series_param: There is NO 'series' parameter. The 1500/2500/3500 designation is part of the model name itself.
notes.hd_suffix: The 'HD' suffix appears in vehicle display titles but is NOT part of the model/trim filter labels.
notes.trim_matching: Trims are loaded dynamically. The scraper uses fuzzy matching to find partial matches (e.g., 'Denali Ultimate' â†’ 'Denali 6 1/2 ft').
notes.interactive_only: All filtering is done through interactive UI elements (checkboxes), NOT URL parameters.
